pkgmetadata.longdescription: Using Web Crawler to Obtain Real-Time Movie Data for Further Analysis // With this package, users can get access to some of the most authoritative movie-rating websites( https://movie.douban.com and https://www.imdb.com ). Using wed crawler users can obtain real-time movie data. By using different functions, users can obtain data of the top rated movies as well as the recent most popular movies. The obtained data, which can be used for further analysis, includes the names, release time as well as their ratings, etc.
